entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:12 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with periods of rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm except 5 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. High plus 2. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 5:15 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
